text: Mr. Freeze: Reverse Blast (previously known as Mr. Freeze) is a steel launched shuttle roller coaster. ==Other websites== * Mr. Freeze: Reverse Blast at Six Flags Over Texas * Mr. Freeze: Reverse Blast at Six Flags St. Louis * Mr. Freeze: Reverse Blast (Six Flags Over Texas) at RCDB * Mr. Freeze: Reverse Blast (Six Flags St. Louis) at RCDB ==References== Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Missouri Category:Roller coasters in Texas Category:1990s establishments in Texas
title: Mr. Freeze (roller coaster)
